Description: Log message optimized for viewing in a log viewer.
SHA1 hash used as checksum of the data collected by the agent.
Device that is the source of the file.
Primary group ID (GID) of the file.
Primary group name of the file.
Inode representing the file in the filesystem.
Last time the file content was modified.
Full path to the file, including the file name.
List of permissions related to the file.
The user ID (UID) or security identifier (SID) of the file owner.
Date/time when the state was last modified.
Extended build information for the agent.
List of groups the agent belongs to.
